participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly and nostalgic, enjoys discussing classic movies and has a sentimental side.
participant_1.background: My Nintendo 64 is probably my most valued possession because it was my first console and it has a lot of sentimental value to me. I have freckles all over my face. I am a recent college graduate looking for a job in marketing. My father is a mechanic. My dolls help me cope with the stress of my job.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Passionate and reflective, focuses on personal growth through sports and enjoys music.
participant_2.background: I will probably focus more on my football career to get my mind off of the breakup. I'm in my last year of grad school. I have male pattern baldness. My favorite way to celebrate is to blast music in my car and dance around. My favorite movie is 16 candles.

content.text: Hello!
Hi there!
What\'s up?
Not much, just watching 16 candles.
Oh cool! That\'s a great movie.
Yeah it is. I\'m a big fan of John Hughes.
Me too! I love most of his movies.
Me too. They\'re so nostalgic.
Yeah they are. What other movies do you like?
I like a lot of different movies. But some of my favorites are Back to the Future, The Breakfast Club, and Ferris Bueller\'s Day Off.
Those are all great movies! I love them all.
Me too! I\'m a big fan of John Hughes.
Me too! I love most of his movies.
What\'s your favorite John Hughes movie?
That\'s a tough one. But I think I\'d have to say The Breakfast Club.
That\'s a great choice! I love that movie too.
Me too! It\'s so iconic.
Yeah it is. It\'s one of those movies that you can watch over and over again and it\'s always good.
I agree! It\'s a classic.
Yeah it is.
Well, it was nice chatting with you. I hope you have a good day.
You too!
